title: CMC launches e-diriya mobile app for women
body_lines: The e-diriya mobile application that provides information on services available to woman was launched today by the Colombo Municipal Council (CMC) to mark International Women's Day. Colombo Mayor Rosy Senanayake said the app promotes unique features that will keep women safe, connecting women to police, to ambulance services, fire services and the range of other services of the CMC. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
